articles.author: ET Auto
articles.title: Now, an EV showroom catches fire in MP : third since December - ETAuto
articles.description: An e-Ashwa automotive dealership caught fire in Balaghat, MP on Thursday. Company claims a short circuit was the cause of the fire, adding that no vehicle was involved. No injuries were reported either.
articles.content:
This is also the third incident in the last four months of fire in an EV showroom.
After a spate of battery fires in electric scooters in the last few days, this time an electric vehicle dealership … [+2486 chars]
